layout.midground: extending into the distance with tall buildings on either side
layout.background: varying architectural designs creating a canyon-like effect

perception.setting: busy urban environment, possibly downtown or financial district
perception.lighting: warm, golden sunlight from sunrise or sunset creating backlit glow and reflections on glass surfaces

narration.main_narration: In this busy urban environment, you find yourself surrounded by towering skyscrapers and buildings that extend into the distance, framing a city street below. The varying architectural designs create a canyon-like effect, inviting contemplation as you gaze up at the impressive structures. Warm, golden sunlight from sunrise or sunset casts a gentle backlit glow on the glass surfaces, reflecting shades of grey and brown with hints of white throughout the scene. This tranquil atmosphere inspires a sense of awe and reflection amidst the bustling energy of downtown.
